name: Move On!
overview: A puzzle game from Ingo Kusch and published in Game On 1993/06. The universe's entropy level collapsed and the only chance to rescue the universe is an attempt to stop the increasing entropy chaos by "recombinating" the disordered structures. The icons on your screen belong to separated and disordered energy structures which have to be recombined my moving them. Match icons together where they will annihilate themselves. And this is how you will decrease entropy. Also watch out for bombs and transmitters which have special effects on their surroundings.
